properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 6:43PM CST until February 8 at 8:10PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331
Highway Bridge...

.Additional heavy rainfall across the Catoma Creek basin, added to
the rain that has already fallen, will continue to lead to
significant rises there. A Flood Warning remains in effect for
Catoma Creek at trhe U.S. Highway 331 Bridge.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge.
* from Friday morning to Saturday evening...or until the Warning is
cancelled.
* AT  6:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 2.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday morning and continue to
rise to near 21.1 feet by early Saturday morning. The river will
fall below flood stage by Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 20.0 feet...Flooding of agricultural lands in the
vicinity of the U.S. 331 Highway Bridge occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
